p: In vitro germinated seedlings were seeded on MS medium [ 15], containing half the concentration of macronutrients (MS Â½), plus 2% sucrose, 0.1 g/L myo-inositol, 0.5 mg/L benzyladenine (BA), and 6.4 g/L agar until sufficient plants were obtained to carry out the experiments for callus induction.
